thread.title: Veteran actor, anti-Obama troll James Woods has a new target: Bernie Sanders
thread.title_full: Veteran actor, anti-Obama troll James Woods has a new target: Bernie Sanders

author: Matt Levin
title: Veteran actor, anti-Obama troll James Woods has a new target: Bernie Sanders
text:
Belinda Carlisle (middle), of the Go-Go's Belinda Carlisle (middle), of the Go-Go's Image 30 of 32 Jeff Tweedy (front center), of Wilco Jeff Tweedy (front center), of Wilco Photo: HO Hunter "Patch" Adams , founder of the Gesundheit! Institute and subject of the movie "Patch Adams" Hunter "Patch" Adams , founder of the Gesundheit! Institute and subject of the movie "Patch Adams" Photo: LUCA BRUNO, AP Veteran actor, anti-Obama troll James Woods has a new target: Bernie Sanders 1 / 32 Back to Gallery 
Left-wing Senator Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) has a horde of supporters – from Will Ferrell to Sarah Silverman to members of the Red Hot Chili Peppers – in showbiz. 
Now his Hollywood nemesis has revealed himself: Twice Oscar-nominated actor James Woods, who thinks Sanders is an “utter moron.” 
The 68-year-old performer disagreed with a Bernie Sanders statement on Twitter about maternity leave. Sanders wrote Monday that “China – not exactly seen as a model when it comes to human rights – provides 14 weeks of maternity leave. The U.S. provides zero.” 
In response, Woods had this to say: China has notoriously killed female infants for population control, you utter moron. #ChinaGendercide https://t.co/GBNSaNNJaC — James Woods (@RealJamesWoods) October 19, 2015 
Many other conservatives jumped on Sanders for making the comparison between China with its “one-child policy” and the United States. Now some might say that critics missed the point of Sanders’ tweet since the candidate did address China’s human rights record, and stated that in spite of that the Asian superpower still offers maternity leave. 
Sanders repeatedly called the United Stats’ failure to provide paid maternity leave an embarrassment. 
Woods also has for years trolled Barack Obama on Twitter much to the delight of conservative media.
